snippet: Alibaba confirms it will begin the process of going public in New York. | Vodafone agrees to purchase the Spanish cable company Ono. | Investors are waiting to see the extent of Western sanctions on Russia after Crimea’s vote to secede from...
abstract: Alibaba confirms it will begin the process of going public in New York. | Vodafone agrees to purchase the Spanish cable company Ono. | Investors are waiting to see the extent of Western sanctions on Russia after Crimea’s vote to secede from Ukraine. | The Justice Department put investigations of mortgage crime on the back burner.

headline.main: Alibaba's New York State of Mind
